Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.controller.server

Class Observable<T>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.controller.server.Observable<T>
Type Parameters:
T - is the generic representing the state observed by each Observer
Direct Known Subclasses:
ServerNetworkHandler
public class Observable<T>
extends java.lang.Object
Brief An Observable is an object which state is of Observer's interest and it has the purpose to keep the up to date
